update.Script: set @FiscalYear = Convert(Nvarchar(4),Year(@StartDate))+Convert(Nvarchar(4),Year(@EndDate)) set Qtr1 = @StartDate set Qtr2 = DateAdd(m,3,@StartDate) set Qtr3 = DateAdd(m,6,@StartDate) set Qtr4 = DateAdd(m,9,@StartDate)

set @FiscalYear = Convert(Nvarchar(4),Year(@StartDate))+Convert(Nvarchar(4),Year(@EndDate)) set @Qtr1 = @StartDate set @Qtr2 = DateAdd(m,3,@StartDate) set @Qtr3 = DateAdd(m,6,@StartDate) set @Qtr4 = DateAdd(m,9,@StartDate)

set @Qtr1 = @StartDate set @Qtr2 = DateAdd(m,3,@StartDate) set @Qtr3 = DateAdd(m,6,@StartDate) set @Qtr4 = DateAdd(m,9,@StartDate) set @EndDate = DateAdd(d,-1DateAdd(m,12,@StartDate)) set @FiscalYear = Convert(Nvarchar(4),Year(@StartDate))+Convert(Nvarchar(4),Year(@EndDate))

set @Qtr1 = @StartDate set @Qtr2 = DateAdd(m,3,@StartDate) set @Qtr3 = DateAdd(m,6,@StartDate) set @Qtr4 = DateAdd(m,9,@StartDate) set @EndDate = DateAdd(day,-1,DateAdd(m,12,@StartDate)) set @FiscalYear = Convert(Nvarchar(4),Year(@StartDate))+Convert(Nvarchar(4),Year(@EndDate))

declare @moneyreceiptRef nvarchar(50)
exec UPS_MRInsertUpdateAcc @MRDate ,@PayCatID ,@ModeofReceiptID ,@Checkno ,@ReceAmount ,@CheckDate ,@CheckPostDate ,@CheckBankName,@BankBranch,@Remarks, @AccFundID, @CoaDetailID, @GName, @GFathersName,@Gaddress,@moneyreceiptRef output if (@moneyreceiptRef is not null ) begin set @Result_ShowAlert = @moneyreceiptRef +' is saved' set @Result_NavigateUrl ='MoneyReceiptsSales.aspx' end

declare @moneyreceiptRef nvarchar(50)
exec UPS_MRInsertUpdateAcc_Sales @MRDate ,@PayCatID ,@ModeofReceiptID ,@Checkno ,@ReceAmount ,@CheckDate ,@CheckPostDate ,@CheckBankName,@BankBranch,@Remarks, @AccFundID, @CoaDetailID, @AccSubNameID, @moneyreceiptRef output if (@moneyreceiptRef is not null ) begin set @Result_ShowAlert = @moneyreceiptRef +' is saved' end

end

update.Script: set @AccFundID=@BusinessRules_CompanyID

set @AccFundID=@BusinessRules_CompanyID
Declare @ImpressFundAmt decimal(18,2), @ImpTrans decimal(18,2)
Select @ImpressFundAmt=OpenAmount from dbo.ImpresstFund where ImpresstFundID=@ImpresstFundID Select @ImpTrans=Sum(Amount) from ImpresstFundTrans where ImpresstFundID=@ImpresstFundID If(@ImpressFundAmt<=@ImpTrans) BEGIN
END

set @AccFundID=@BusinessRules_CompanyID
Declare @ImpressFundAmt decimal(18,2), @ImpTrans decimal(18,2)
Select @ImpressFundAmt=OpenAmount from dbo.ImpresstFund where ImpresstFundID=@ImpresstFundID Select @ImpTrans=Sum(Amount) from ImpresstFundTrans where ImpresstFundID=@ImpresstFundID If(@ImpressFundAmt<=@ImpTrans) BEGIN set @Result_ShowAlert = 'Transection Grater then Cash.' END
set @AccFundID=@BusinessRules_CompanyID

Declare @ImpressFundAmt decimal(18,2), @ImpTrans decimal(18,2)
Select @ImpressFundAmt=OpenAmount from dbo.ImpresstFund where ImpresstFundID=@ImpresstFundID Select @ImpTrans=Sum(Amount) from ImpresstFundTrans where ImpresstFundID=@ImpresstFundID If(@ImpressFundAmt<=@ImpTrans) BEGIN set @Result_ShowAlert = 'Transection Grater then Cash.' END

Declare @ImpressFundAmt decimal(18,2), @ImpTrans decimal(18,2)
Select @ImpressFundAmt=OpenAmount from dbo.ImpresstFund where ImpresstFundID=@ImpresstFundID Select @ImpTrans=Sum(Amount) from ImpresstFundTrans where ImpresstFundID=@ImpresstFundID If(@ImpressFundAmt<=@ImpTrans) BEGIN set @BusinessRules_PreventDefault = 1 set @Result_ShowAlert = 'Transection Grater then Cash.' END

Declare @ImpressFundAmt decimal(18,2), @ImpTrans decimal(18,2), @Totamt decimal(18,2)
Select @ImpressFundAmt=OpenAmount from dbo.ImpresstFund where ImpresstFundID=@ImpresstFundID Select @ImpTrans=Sum(Amount) from ImpresstFundTrans where ImpresstFundID=@ImpresstFundID Set @Totamt=@ImpTrans+@Amount If(@ImpressFundAmt<=@Totamt) BEGIN set @BusinessRules_PreventDefault = 1 set @Result_ShowAlert = 'Transection Grater then Cash.' END

declare @pdcrreceiptRef nvarchar(50) exec UPS_PDCIssue @PDCDate, @PayeeCode, @PayCatID,@ModeofReceiptID, @Amount, @NoOfPdc, @OtherRemarks,@IsSameAmount,@ChequeNo,@BankName, @BranchName,@AccFundID, @HeadOfExpense, @BankAccountHOA, @pdcrreceiptRef output if (@pdcrreceiptRef is not null ) begin set @Result_ShowAlert = @pdcrreceiptRef+' is saved' set @Result_NavigateUrl ='InwardPDCEntry.aspx'
end
